      • setStopLoss

        public void setStopLoss(double stop_value,
               ValueType valueType)
        Sets Stop Loss for all symbols in the portfolio.
          Call this method inside the onEvent()

        // 8% stop loss
        setStopLoss(8.00, ValueType.PERCENTAGE);
                
                or  
  
        // 600 usd stop loss
        setStopLoss(600.00, ValueType.NUMERIC);

        Parameters:
        stop_value -
        valueType -

      • setStopLossForSymbol

        public void setStopLossForSymbol(java.lang.String symbol,
                        double stop_value,
                        ValueType valueType)
        Sets StopLoss for given Symbol in the portfolio.
          Call this method inside the onEvent()
  
        // 4.00 % 
        setStopLoss("IBM", 4.00, ValueType.PERCENTAGE);
        
        or
  
                // 500 USD  
        setStopLoss("IBM", 500.00, ValueType.NUMERIC);

        Parameters:
        percentage_stop -

      • setStopProfit

        public void setStopProfit(double stop_value,
                 ValueType valueType)
        Sets Stop Profit for all symbols in the portfolio.
